attributes.action: To debate, with a view to cancelling, the State Visit by President Donald Trump
attributes.additional_details: With his most recent retweets of Far Right hate and radical group Britain First’s content, arguably endorsing an islamophobic and racist agenda, as well as questionable previous & historical conduct, it is felt that Her Majesty’s Government, as well Her Majesty, are being put in a compromising position whereby a continuation of Trump’s State Visit may be seen as approval and endorsement of the president’s immature, hostile and unbecoming behaviour and unfairly tar our great nation.
attributes.background: With a continuing history of bringing the Presidency and the U.S. into disrepute with conduct and immaturity unbecoming a person in high political office, it is the considered view of a vast number of British citizens that President Donald Trump not be allowed to carry out his State Visit to the UK.
